experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Development of components and functionalities, consultation and requests to APIs and correction of errors of a cryptocurrency ATM system, developed in Electron and React.

experience.title: Terminal work: Design of an electronic chair for a dental workstation.
experience.description: Design and simulation of the prototype of an electronic chair with three degrees of freedom for a dental workstation using the VDI 2206 methodology for the design of mechatronic systems.

projects.title: Projects
projects.project: Artificial vision and robotic control using Labview
projects.description: Closed-loop control of a robotic arm with 3-degree-of-freedom servomotors, using the Labview machine vision module.
P.I.D control with analog electronics to control the position of a D.C. motor in which gravity acts.

projects.project: Animation of the kinematics of a robotic arm
projects.description: Desktop application made in Java to visualize and control the kinematics of an articulated system with two planar degrees of freedom to represent the movement of a simple robotic arm through a video game controller.

lifePhilosophy.title: Philosophy of life
lifePhilosophy.description: " Trust yourself. Create the type of person with whom you will be happy to live your whole life. Make the most of yourself by stoking the tiny inner sparks of flaming possibilities of achievement. " —Golda Meir

education.title: Ing. Mechatronica
education.description: Degree work in progress. (Final work, Degree thesis.)
